mapper.select: select count(*) from ZZ_Module where IsDel = 0
select count(*) from ZZ_Module where IsDel = 0 and M_Name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
select M_Id, M_PId, M_Name, M_Value, M_Url, M_Icon, M_Des, CreatePerson, CreateTime, UpdateTime, SortCode, Status, IsDel from ZZ_Module where IsDel = 0 order by SortCode limit #{rowNo},#{pageSize}

select M_Id, M_PId, M_Name, M_Value, M_Url, M_Icon, M_Des, CreatePerson, CreateTime, UpdateTime, SortCode, `Status`, IsDel from ZZ_Module where IsDel = 0 and M_Name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') order by SortCode limit #{rowNo},#{pageSize}

select distinct a.* from ZZ_Module as a inner join ZZ_RoleModule as b on a.M_Id = b.Module_Id inner join ZZ_RoleUser as c on b.Role_Id = c.Role_Id where c.User_Id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY a.SortCode
select count(*) from ZZ_Module where M_PId=#{mid}
